template.description: This template takes input as text files and attempts to parse them through the CoreNLP webservice saving the data to the filesystem and then extracting location tokens and passing this to the TwoFish Webservice to extract locations and save the output to the filesystem.
template.name: NLP_Extraction_with_GeoLocation_Extraction
